	//# sourceMappingURL=https://s3.amazonaws.com/d3jlsadfjkuern/1.7.310/Ym9vdHN0cmFwLmpz.map</script>
<script type="text/javascript">

	/*
	 * Setup googletag for GPT loading
	 */
	function _resetGPT(isAdblocker) {

		/*
		 *  Setup command queue w/ adslots and enable.  Note the different adslots for w/ adblocker and w/o
		 */
		if (isAdblocker) {

			if ( googletag && googletag.cmd ) {
				googletag.cmd.push( function() { googletag.destroySlots();});
			}

			window.googletag = {};
			window.googletag.cmd = [];

			if ( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc && 'undefined' !== typeof pmc.hooks ) {

				pmc.hooks.add_filter( 'pmc_adm_gpt_slot', function( slot ) {
					if ( 'string' === typeof slot ) {
						var slot_components = slot.split('/');
						var components = [];
						for (var i = 0; i < slot_components.length; i++) {
							if (slot_components[i] !== 'undefined' && slot_components[i] !== null && slot_components[i] !== "") {
								components.push(slot_components[i]);
							}
						}
						slot_component = components[2];
						if(slot_component.indexOf('source-') === -1 ){
							slot = slot.replace( '/'+slot_component, '/source-'+slot_component );
						}
					}
					return slot;
				} );
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_adm_gpt && 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_adm_gpt.settings) {
				var ad_list =  pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list;
				// Empty the adlist and keep only the default ad-group for recovery. Do not pass interstitial and prestitial for recovery with sp
				pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list = {};
				for ( var t in ad_list ) {
					if( 'default' === t ) {
						pmc_adm_gpt.settings.ad_list['default'] = ad_list['default'];
						break;
					}
				}
				pmc_adm_gpt.init( pmc_adm_gpt.settings );
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_admanager ) {
				pmc_admanager.hide_interrupt();
			}

			if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_dfp_prestitial) {
				pmc_dfp_prestitial.properties.isAdSkippedManually = true;
				pmc_dfp_prestitial.destroy();
			}

		}
	}

	/*
	 * Prepare the googletag object and fill the cmd queue
	 */
	_resetGPT(false);

	var gptLoadComplete = false;
	var isBlocking = false;
	var spccDisable = false;

	/*
	 *  Reset and load GPT via Sourcepoint proxy if initial GPT load complete and adblocker detected
	 */
	function _resetAndLoadGPTRecovery() {
		if (gptLoadComplete && isBlocking) {
			_resetGPT(true);
			window._sp_.dfp.loadGPT();
		}
	}

	/*
	 *  Add callbacks to set our 'gptLoadComplete' flag and optionally load recovery
	 */
	window._sp_gpt_callback = function() {
		gptLoadComplete = true;
		_resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
	};

	/*
	 * Configure Sourcepoint
	 */

	window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
	window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
	window._sp_.config.account_id = 239;
	window._sp_.config.publisher_base = "//sp.wwd.com/abc";
	window._sp_.config.gpt_auto_load = false;
	window._sp_.config.enable_rid = true;
	window._sp_.config.enable_vid = true;
	window._sp_.config.enable_blocker_style_sheet_disabling = false;

	if( 'undefined' !== typeof window.pmc_cookies && 'undefined' !== window.pmc_cookies._pmc_spcc && '1' === window.pmc_cookies._pmc_spcc ) {
		spccDisable = true;
	}
			if ( spccDisable !== true ) {
			window._sp_.config.content_control_callback = function () {
				window.location ="http://wwd.com/wp-content/themes/vip/pmc-plugins/pmc-sp-analytics/templates/cc.html"			};

			window._sp_.config.vid_control_callback = function () {
				window.location ="http://wwd.com/wp-content/themes/vip/pmc-plugins/pmc-sp-analytics/templates/cc.html"			};
		}
	
	/*
	 *  setup listener for adblocker detected. Set flag and optionally load recovery
	 */
	document.addEventListener('sp.blocking', function (e) {
		var admzs = document.getElementsByClassName('admz');
		for (var i = 0; i < admzs.length; i++) {
			admzs[i].className = 'admz-sp';
		}
		isBlocking = true;
		_resetAndLoadGPTRecovery();
	});

	/*
	 * Load sp through bootstrap
	 */
	window.spBootstrap("//sp3.wwd.com/wwd/delivery.js");

</script>

	<script type="text/javascript">
		/* <![CDATA[ */
		function addLoadEvent(func) {
			var oldonload = window.onload;
			if (typeof window.onload != 'function') {
				window.onload = func;
			} else {
				window.onload = function () {
					oldonload();
					func();
				}
			}
		}
		/* ]]> */
	</script>

<link rel="canonical" href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gannis-spring-images-shot-by-jen-steele-10815247/" />

<!-- Swiftype Meta Tags Start -->
<meta class="swiftype" name="content_type" data-type="string" content="Article" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="title" data-type="string" content="Ganni&#039;s Spring Images Shot by Jen Steele" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="author" data-type="string" content="Lisa Lockwood" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="published_at" data-type="date" content="2017-02-23 14:14:49" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="image" data-type="enum" content="http://pmcwwd.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/ganni-girl-two-split-diptych.jpg?crop=0px%2C2px%2C640px%2C427px&#038;resize=300%2C200&#038;ssl=1" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="topics" data-type="string" content="Fashion Scoops" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="verticals" data-type="string" content="Fashion" />
<meta class="swiftype" name="body" data-type="text" content="Danish advanced contemporary collection Ganni has photographed a slew of  new faces for a special photography project.

Photographed by Jen Steele, the &quot;Ganni Girl&quot; crew consists of Taylor Warren, Zaga Grau, Coco Baudelle, Fara Homidi, Jess Green, Yum Komatsu, Arianna Margulis, Abby Sierros, Marisa Competello and Lilli Millhiser. They are not all actual models (just Grau and Baudelle), but rather restaurant owners, florists, artists, stylists, makeup artists and a model agent.

The photos, which show Ganni&#039;s effortless street style, will appear on the company&#039;s social media platforms and will be featured on their retail partner’s site, Need Supply Co.

“I’m excited about the increased focus on authenticity and diversity that is happening in the fashion world at the moment, and I wanted to contribute to that movement,” said Ditte Reffstrup, creative director of Ganni. “Women with a personal sense of style and with something to say are gradually earning more limelight in fashion media, and I fully support this more inclusive point of view. At Ganni, we do not work with a specific woman in terms of age, occupation or origin, it’s the real women I see on the streets everyday who I find truly inspiring.”

Headquartered in Copenhagen, Ganni is family-owned and has been run by Reffstrup and her husband, chief executive officer Nicolai Reffstrup since 2009. The collection is sold in more than 400 retailers worldwide, as well as in 18 of their own concept stores in Denmark, Norway and Sweden. Among their retail accounts are Need Supply, Net-a-porter, Mytheresa, Shopbop, Otte and Kirna Zabete. Ganni designs four women’s ready-to-wear collections a year, footwear, accessories and lingerie collections.

Ganni has never done traditional advertising and instead relies on influencer marketing. “We work with a ton of great influencers and our customers really love our product and are eager to share their outfits/new purchases on social media which has been really great for our digital presence,” said a company spokeswoman. “We feel that this direct to consumer marketing is most aligned with how Ganni operates, and wishes to continue operating as a company.”" />
<!-- Swiftype Meta Tags End -->

<!-- GPT interchange code -->
<script>
 window.Krux || ((Krux = function() {
   Krux.q.push(arguments);
 }).q = []);
 (function() {
   function retrieve(n) {
     var m, k = 'kx' + n;
     if (window.localStorage) {
       return window.localStorage[k] || "";
     } else if (navigator.cookieEnabled) {
       m = document.cookie.match(k + '=([^;]*)');
       return (m && unescape(m[1])) || "";
     } else {
       return '';
     }
   }
   Krux.user = retrieve('user');
   Krux.segments = retrieve('segs') && retrieve('segs').split(',') || [];
 })();
</script>

						<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16.2 16.3"><title>search</title><path class="search-polygon-1" d="M6 11.2C3.1 11.2.8 8.8.8 6S3.1.8 6 .8c2.9 0 5.2 2.4 5.2 5.2S8.9 11.2 6 11.2zM11.2 11.3l4.5 4.5"></path></svg>
					</span>
					</button>
					<button id="close-mobile-search">
					<span class="site-header__mobile-close-search">
						<svg width="17px" height="17px" viewBox="294 62 17 17" version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"><title>Close</title><g id="site-header__close-icon" fill-rule="evenodd" transform="translate(295.000000, 63.000000)"><path d="M0.474533333,0.474533333 L14.7012,14.7012" stroke-width="1.007"></path><path d="M14.7008,0.474533333 L0.474133333,14.7012" stroke-width="1.007"></path></g></svg>
					</span>
					</button>
							</div>
							<div class="site-header__mobile-menu-subscribe">
					<a href="http://wwd.com/subscriptions/">
						SUBSCRIBE TO						<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 101.6 29.8"><title>WWD logo</title><path d="M84.8 29.8c8.7 0 16.8-3.1 16.8-14.9S93.5 0 84.8 0H77l-3.1 11.7v18.1h10.9zm-2.3-7.6V7.6h2.4c5.4 0 7.8 1.9 7.8 7.3s-2.4 7.3-7.8 7.3h-2.4zm-40.4 7.6h8.5l4.2-15.9L59 29.8h8.6l8-29.8h-8l-4.2 16.3L59.1 0H51l-4.4 16.5-4-15.4-4.1 15.5 3.6 13.2zm-34 0h8.6l4.2-15.9 4.2 15.9h8.5l8-29.8h-7.9l-4.2 16.4L25.1 0H17l-4.3 16.3L8.5 0H0l8.1 29.8z"/></svg>

<li id="menu-item-10507455" class="site-header__nav-main menu-item menu-item-type-taxonomy menu-item-object-vertical menu-item-has-children menu-item-10507455 site-header__nav-main"><a href="http://wwd.com/accessories-news/">Accessories</a>
<ul class='sub-menu vertical-accessories-news'>

		</div>
	</footer>
</div>
		</div>

		<div class="site-header__bottom-bar">

			
				<div aria-label="Women&#039;s Wear Daily" class="site-header__logo site-header__logo--sticky"><a href="/" class="site-header__home-link"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 101.6 29.8"><title>WWD logo</title><path d="M84.8 29.8c8.7 0 16.8-3.1 16.8-14.9S93.5 0 84.8 0H77l-3.1 11.7v18.1h10.9zm-2.3-7.6V7.6h2.4c5.4 0 7.8 1.9 7.8 7.3s-2.4 7.3-7.8 7.3h-2.4zm-40.4 7.6h8.5l4.2-15.9L59 29.8h8.6l8-29.8h-8l-4.2 16.3L59.1 0H51l-4.4 16.5-4-15.4-4.1 15.5 3.6 13.2zm-34 0h8.6l4.2-15.9 4.2 15.9h8.5l8-29.8h-7.9l-4.2 16.4L25.1 0H17l-4.3 16.3L8.5 0H0l8.1 29.8z"/></svg>
</a></div>

				
					<button id="toggle-sticky-menu" class="site-header__sections-button">
						<span class="site-header__button-wrap-inner">Sections<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 16"><path class="hamburger-polygon-1" d="M0 0l2 2.3h22V0M0 6.9l2 2.3h22V6.9M0 13.7L2 16h22v-2.3"></path></svg></span>
					</button>

				
				<h2 class="site-header__tagline">Fashion. Beauty. Business.</h2>

	<div class="top-bar-wrap">
		
<div class="top-bar-story active">

	
	<h3 class="top-bar-story-section vertical-fashion-news"><a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/">Fashion</a></h3>

	<h4 class="top-bar-story-header"><a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/designer-luxury/exclusive-chanel-new-ads-pharrell-williams-kristen-stewart-gabrielle-bag-10840808/">Exclusive: Pharrell Williams First Man to Appear in Chanel Handbag Ads</a></h4>

	
<p class="hp-card__story-card-meta">
			<span class="icon-clock"><svg width="1792" height="1792" viewBox="0 0 1792 1792" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><title>clock</title><path d="M1024 544v448q0 14-9 23t-23 9h-320q-14 0-23-9t-9-23v-64q0-14 9-23t23-9h224v-352q0-14 9-23t23-9h64q14 0 23 9t9 23zm416 352q0-148-73-273t-198-198-273-73-273 73-198 198-73 273 73 273 198 198 273 73 273-73 198-198 73-273zm224 0q0 209-103 385.5t-279.5 279.5-385.5 103-385.5-103-279.5-279.5-103-385.5 103-385.5 279.5-279.5 385.5-103 385.5 103 279.5 279.5 103 385.5z" fill="#fff"></path></svg>
</span>
	
	<span aria-label="Date published" class="hp-card__story-card-time">March 10, 2017</span>
	&bull; <span aria-label="Author" class="hp-card__story-card-author">Miles Socha</span>
</p>
</div>

<div class="top-bar-story">

	
	<h3 class="top-bar-story-section vertical-fashion-news"><a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/">Fashion</a></h3>

	<h4 class="top-bar-story-header"><a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-features/chloe-natacha-ramsay-levi-creative-director-10841690/">French Label Chloé Appoints Natacha Ramsay-Levi as Creative Director</a></h4>

	
<p class="hp-card__story-card-meta">
			<span class="icon-clock"><svg width="1792" height="1792" viewBox="0 0 1792 1792" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><title>clock</title><path d="M1024 544v448q0 14-9 23t-23 9h-320q-14 0-23-9t-9-23v-64q0-14 9-23t23-9h224v-352q0-14 9-23t23-9h64q14 0 23 9t9 23zm416 352q0-148-73-273t-198-198-273-73-273 73-198 198-73 273 73 273 198 198 273 73 273-73 198-198 73-273zm224 0q0 209-103 385.5t-279.5 279.5-385.5 103-385.5-103-279.5-279.5-103-385.5 103-385.5 279.5-279.5 385.5-103 385.5 103 279.5 279.5 103 385.5z" fill="#fff"></path></svg>

</p>
</div>

	<h3 class="top-bar-story-section vertical-beauty-industry-news"><a href="http://wwd.com/beauty-industry-news/">Beauty</a></h3>

	<h4 class="top-bar-story-header"><a href="http://wwd.com/beauty-industry-news/color-cosmetics/mac-cosmetics-to-enter-ulta-beauty-10841318/">MAC Cosmetics to Enter Ulta Beauty in Bid For New Audience</a></h4>

	<div id="eventListHolder" class="nodisplay"></div>
<div id="bread-crumb" class="site__bread-crumbs desktop clearfix">
	<ul>
					<li>
				<a  href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/">
					Fashion				</a>
			</li>
						<li>
				<a class="bread-crumb-selected" href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/">
					<span class='square'></span>Fashion Scoops				</a>
			</li>
				</ul>

<article itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Article">
<div id="content-header-post">
	<div class="article-header clearfix">
	<div id="header-container">
	<h1 class="desktop" itemprop="headline">Ganni&#8217;s Spring Images Shot by Jen Steele</h1>
	<h2 id="dek" class="desktop" itemprop="description">The images feature an eclectic mix of young women ranging from models and restaurant owners to florists and stylists. </h2>
	</div>
	</div>
</div>
<div id="main" role="main" class="article-main">
	<div id="content" class="post-10815247 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-fashion-scoops vertical-fashion-news">

	
		
<div id="article-header-outer-container">

	<!-- hidden meta information about the article --> 
<div id="hiddenVariables" style="display:none;">
	<input type="hidden" id="article-id" value="8085304"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="pagetype" value="article"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="subCat" value="Government and Trade"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="article-date" value="2014-12-23"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="content-date" name="content-date" value="2014-12-23"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="region" name="region" value="North America"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="regionUrl" name="regionUrl" value="north-america"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="article-access-type" value="Gated Paid"/>
</div>

	<div id="content-header">
		<div id="param-container" style="display:none;"></div>
		<div class="article-header clearfix">

			<!-- hidden meta information about the article --> 
<div id="hiddenVariables" style="display:none;">
	<input type="hidden" id="article-id" value="8085304"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="pagetype" value="article"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="subCat" value="Government and Trade"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="article-date" value="2014-12-23"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="content-date" name="content-date" value="2014-12-23"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="region" name="region" value="North America"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="regionUrl" name="regionUrl" value="north-america"/>
	<input type="hidden" id="article-access-type" value="Gated Paid"/>
</div>

			<div id="header-container">
				<div class="author-wrap">
					<div id="author-container">
						By <a href="http://wwd.com/wwd-masthead/lisa-lockwood/" itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Person"><span>Lisa Lockwood</span></a>&nbsp;on&nbsp;February 23, 2017					</div>

					<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" style="display:none;" height="0" width="0">

</symbol>

	<div id="article-content" class="size-text article-intro ">

		
			
	<div class="gallery-image-section">

		
			<a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gallery/ganni-girl-spring-2017-10814885/">

		
			
				<img src="http://pmcwwd.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/ganni-girl-two-split-diptych.jpg?crop=0px%2C2px%2C640px%2C427px&#038;resize=640%2C415&#038;ssl=1" height="415" width="640">

			
			<span class="gallery-img-count">
	<span class="icon-photo">
		<svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 485.211 485.21" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path id="svg_1" fill="#fff" d="m454.88901,121.303l0,303.25501l-363.91101,0l0,-303.25501l363.91101,0m30.32199,-30.326l-424.55999,0l0,363.90899l424.55999,0l0,-363.90899zm-363.907,272.928l303.25697,0l-60.65298,-181.95099l-90.97601,121.302l-60.64999,-60.651l-90.97799,121.29999l0.00001,0zm30.32399,-181.95099c-16.76199,0 -30.32399,13.565 -30.32399,30.327s13.562,30.32401 30.32399,30.32401s30.327,-13.56201 30.327,-30.32401s-13.562,-30.327 -30.327,-30.327zm-151.628,-151.62801l0,363.90999l30.327,0l0,-333.58598l394.23499,0l0,-30.324l-424.56202,0l0.00003,-0.00001z"/>
</svg>	</span>
	&nbsp;

	Photos</span>

			</a>

			
		
			
			<a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gallery/ganni-girl-spring-2017-10814885/#!4/ganni-girl-spring-2017-7" class="gallery-thumbnail">
				<img src="https://pmcwwd.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/ganni-girl-s17-7.jpg?quality=95&#038;crop=0px%2C0px%2C906px%2C906px&#038;resize=152%2C152&#038;ssl=1" height="152" width="152" />
			</a>

			
		
			
			<a href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gallery/ganni-girl-spring-2017-10814885/#!5/ganni-girl-spring-2017-8" class="gallery-thumbnail">
				<img src="https://pmcwwd.files.wordpress.com/2017/02/ganni-girl-s17-8.jpg?quality=95&#038;crop=0px%2C0px%2C906px%2C906px&#038;resize=152%2C152&#038;ssl=1" height="152" width="152" />
			</a>

				</div>
	
	</div>



		
		
	<div class="content-images">

		
			
		
		
	</div>

		<div class="article-copy" itemprop="articleBody">

			
			
<div class="clear-right align-right margin-bottom-medium margin-left-medium wwd-in-article-ad">
		<a  href="https://w1.buysub.com/servlet/OrdersGateway?cds_mag_code=WW3&#038;cds_page_id=208649&#038;cds_response_key=86LJDBNFA"  rel="nofollow"  target="_blank"  ><br />
			<img src="https://s0.wp.com/wp-content/themes/vip/plugins/lazy-load/images/1x1.trans.gif" data-lazy-src="https://s0.wp.com/wp-content/themes/vip/pmc-wwd-2016/static/images/FreeArticle_320x150_desktop.png" width="320" height="150"><noscript><img src="https://s0.wp.com/wp-content/themes/vip/pmc-wwd-2016/static/images/FreeArticle_320x150_desktop.png" width="320" height="150" /></noscript><br />
		</a>
	</div>
<p>Danish advanced contemporary collection Ganni has photographed a slew of&nbsp; new faces for a special photography project.</p>
<p></p>
<p>Photographed by Jen Steele, the &#8220;Ganni Girl&#8221; crew consists of Taylor Warren, Zaga Grau, Coco Baudelle, Fara Homidi, Jess Green, Yum Komatsu, Arianna Margulis, Abby Sierros, Marisa Competello and Lilli Millhiser. They are not all actual models (just Grau and Baudelle), but rather restaurant owners, florists, artists, stylists, makeup artists and a model agent.</p>
<p>The photos, which show Ganni&#8217;s effortless street style, will appear on the company&#8217;s social media platforms and will be featured on their retail partner&rsquo;s site, Need Supply Co.</p>
<p>&ldquo;I&rsquo;m excited about the increased focus on authenticity and diversity that is happening in the fashion world at the moment, and I wanted to contribute to that movement,&rdquo; said Ditte Reffstrup, creative director of Ganni. &ldquo;Women with a personal sense of style and with something to say are gradually earning more limelight in fashion media, and I fully support this more inclusive point of view. At Ganni, we do not work with a specific woman in terms of age, occupation or origin, it&rsquo;s the real women I see on the streets everyday who I find truly inspiring.&rdquo;</p>
<p>Headquartered in Copenhagen, Ganni is family-owned and has been run by Reffstrup and her husband, chief executive officer Nicolai Reffstrup since 2009. The collection is sold in more than 400 retailers worldwide, as well as in 18 of their own concept stores in Denmark, Norway and Sweden. <a  href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/ready-to-wear/danish-brand-ganni-sets-collaborations-for-spring-10784793/"  >Among their retail accounts</a> are Need Supply, Net-a-porter, Mytheresa, Shopbop, Otte and Kirna Zabete. Ganni designs four women&rsquo;s ready-to-wear collections a year, footwear, accessories and lingerie collections.</p>
<p>Ganni has never done traditional advertising and instead relies on influencer marketing. &ldquo;We work with a ton of great influencers and our customers really love our product and are eager to share their outfits/new purchases on social media which has been really great for our digital presence,&rdquo; said a company spokeswoman. &ldquo;We feel that this direct to consumer marketing is most aligned with how Ganni operates, and wishes to continue operating as a company.&rdquo;</p>

		</div>

		
	</div>

	
	
	<div
		class="subscriber-ad"
		id="free-message-end">
		<a href="http://wwd.com/subscriptions/">
			You&#039;re missing something!			<br />
			Activate your <br /><span>FREE PREVIEW</span> now.		</a>
	</div>


	<div class="footer-social-container desktop">

																title="Print This Page">
						<svg>
							<use xlink:href="#pmc-social-share-bar-print"></use>
						</svg>
						<span>
							Print						</span>
					</a>
				</li>
							<li>
											<a data-href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gannis-spring-images-shot-by-jen-steele-10815247/#respond" href="http://wwd.com/fashion-news/fashion-scoops/gannis-spring-images-shot-by-jen-steele-10815247/#respond"
											class="btn-comment"
																title="Talk">
						<svg>
							<use xlink:href="#pmc-social-share-bar-comment"></use>
						</svg>
						<span>
							Talk						</span>
					</a>
				</li>
					</ul>
	</div>
</div>

	</div>
</div>
	
	<div class="widget widget_pmc_outbrain_widget"><div class="outbrain-widget">
			<div class="OUTBRAIN" data-src="DROP_PERMALINK_HERE" data-widget-id="AR_1" data-ob-template="WWD" ></div>
			<div class="OUTBRAIN" data-src="DROP_PERMALINK_HERE" data-widget-id="AR_2" data-ob-template="WWD" ></div>
	</div>
</div>
	<div class="margin-top-medium margin-bottom-medium">
			</div>

	<a href="" class="mobile-comments mobile">load comments <!-- (<span></span>) --></a>

	<div id="dsq-content">
		<ul id="dsq-comments">
					</ul>
			</div>
</div>
		
<a href="http://disqus.com" class="dsq-brlink">blog comments powered by <span class="logo-disqus">Disqus</span></a>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	var disqus_url = "http:\/\/wwd.com\/fashion-news\/fashion-scoops\/gannis-spring-images-shot-by-jen-steele-10815247\/";
	var disqus_identifier = "10815247 http:\/\/wwd.com\/?p=10815247";
	var disqus_container_id = 'disqus_thread';
	var disqus_domain = "disqus.com";
	var disqus_shortname = "wwd";
		var disqus_config = function () {
	    var config = this; // Access to the config object

	    /* 
	       All currently supported events:
	        * preData — fires just before we request for initial data
	        * preInit - fires after we get initial data but before we load any dependencies
	        * onInit  - fires when all dependencies are resolved but before dtpl template is rendered
	        * afterRender - fires when template is rendered but before we show it
	        * onReady - everything is done
	     */

		config.callbacks.preData.push(function() {
			// clear out the container (its filled for SEO/legacy purposes)
			document.getElementById(disqus_container_id).innerHTML = '';
		})
		config.callbacks.onReady.push(function() {
/*
			// sync comments in the background so we don't block the page
			var req = new XMLHttpRequest();
			req.open('GET', '?cf_action=sync_comments&post_id=10815247', true);
			req.send(null);
*/
		});
		
			};
	
	var facebookXdReceiverPath = "http:\/\/pmcwwd.wordpress.com\/wp-content\/themes\/vip\/plugins\/disqus\/xd_receiver.htm";
</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
	var DsqLocal = {

</script>

<script type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8">
(function() {
	var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript';
	dsq.async = true;
	dsq.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.' + disqus_domain + '/embed.js?pname=wordpress&pver=2.40';
	(document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq);
})();
</script>
		</div>
	</div>

	<h3 class="hp-panel__newsletter-header">FREE ALERTS &amp; NEWSLETTERS</h3>
	<form method="post" action="http://pages.email.wwd.com/signup" id="newsletter-module-form" name="newsletter-module-form" class="clearfix" target="_blank">
		<div class="hp-panel__newsletter-signup-form">
			<input type="email" name="EmailAddress" class="toolkitEmail" placeholder="Enter your email address" />

			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_morningreport_Opted_In" value="Yes" />
			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_newsalert_Opted_In" value="Yes" />

			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_promo_house_Opted_In" value="Yes" />
			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_promo_summits_Opted_In" value="Yes" />
			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_promo_WWDpartner_Opted_In" value="Yes" />
			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_unsub_all" value="No" />

			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_newsalert_source" value="onsite-simple" />
			<input type="hidden" name="wwd_morningreport_source" value="onsite-simple" />

			<button type="submit">SIGN UP</button>
			<input type="hidden" name="__contextName" id="__contextName" value="FormPost" />
			<input type="hidden" name="__executionContext" id="__executionContext" value="Post" />
			<input type="hidden" name="__successPage" id="__successPage" value="" />
		</div>
	</form>
	<script>
		/*
		 Add the success input field on both keyup and blur
		 this ensures the field is added when an email address
		 is typed in, pasted in, or selected from the user's browser
		 */
		(function($) {
			$( '.toolkitEmail' ).keyup(function() {
				wwd_add_success_page_input(this);
			} ).blur( function() {
				wwd_add_success_page_input(this);
			} );

			function wwd_add_success_page_input(that) {
				var $this = $(that);
				var emailValue = encodeURIComponent($this.val());
				$this.parents('form').find('#__successPage').val('http://pages.email.wwd.com/newsletters/?email='+emailValue+'&signup=success');
			}
		})(jQuery);
	</script>
	<a target="_blank" href="http://pmc.com/privacy-policy/" class="hp-panel__newsletter-signup-privacy">PRIVACY POLICY</a>
</div>

	<h2 class="hp-panel__photo-archive-heading">Social Studies</h2>
	<span class="hp-panel__photo-archive-heading-background"></span>

	<div class="hp-panel__wrap-inner">
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-slider--wrapper">

			<ul class="hp-panel__social-studies-slider">
				
<li>
	<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-post">
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-image"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BRY4dxAAmcX/?taken-by=wwd"><img src="https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/sh0.08/e35/p640x640/17076828_1959601137603418_1696586002602131456_n.jpg" alt="Parisian street style. #theyarewearing (📷: @kukukuba)" ></a></div>
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-author"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/wwd">@wwd</a></div>
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-caption">Parisian street style. #theyarewearing (📷: @kukukuba)</div>
	</div>
</li>

<li>
	<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-post">
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-image"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BQwSZGngsBv/?taken-by=wwd"><img src="https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/sh0.08/e35/p640x640/16584801_1555151861185016_3309991738654851072_n.jpg" alt="Sauntering down the street in style at #LFW. #theyarewearing (📷: @kukukuba)" ></a></div>
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-author"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/wwd">@wwd</a></div>
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-caption">Sauntering down the street in style at #LFW. #theyarewearing (📷: @kukukuba)</div>
	</div>
</li>

<li>
	<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-post">
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-image"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BQv_mOlgxtK/?taken-by=wwd"><img src="https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s640x640/sh0.08/e35/16790405_596851570507809_7692041725669277696_n.jpg" alt="The Burberry finale brought the high drama to #LFW. 	</div>
</li>

	<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-post">
		<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-image"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BQvoxpjg_Gb/?taken-by=wwd"><img src="https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/sh0.08/e35/p640x640/16906710_819809798167116_1075947637598846976_n.jpg" alt="Feeling groovy at #LFW. #theyarewearing (📷: @kukukuba)" ></a></div>

	</div>
</li>

	<div class="hp-panel__social-studies-post">

				<div id="pmc-ad-bait" class="pub_300x250 pub_300x250m pub_728x90 text-ad textAd text_ad text_ads text-ads text-ad-links" style="width: 0 !important; height: 0 !important; position: fixed !important; left: -99999px !important;">ad</div>

		<script>
			if ( 'undefined' !== typeof jQuery ) {
				var $pmc_ad_bait = jQuery('#pmc-ad-bait');
				if ( $pmc_ad_bait.length ) {
					if ( 'block' !== $pmc_ad_bait.css('display') ) {
						window.pmc_is_adblocked = true;
					}
				}
			}
		</script>
		<script type='text/javascript' class="script-mobile">
pmc_adm_gpt.init({
    "ad_targetings": {
        "host": "wwd.com",
        "kw": [
            "fashion-scoops",

            "shot",
            "jen",
            "steele",

        ],
        "user": "loggedout"
    },
    "ad_list": {
        "default": [
            {
                "targeting": {
                    "pos": "top"
                },
                "slot": "3782/WWD/fashion-news/leaderboard",
                "id": "gpt-wwd-ros-leaderboard-uid0",

                    [
                        728,
                        90
                    ],
                    [
                        970,
                        90
                    ],
                    [
                        970,
                        250
                    ]
                ],
                "bidders": false,
                "is_lazy_load": "no"
            },
            {
                "targeting": [],
                "slot": "3782/WWD/InFocus",

                    [
                        300,
                        111
                    ]
                ],
                "bidders": false,
                "is_lazy_load": "no"
            },
            {
                "targeting": [],
                "slot": "3782/WWD/fashion-news/rail-top",
                "id": "gpt-wwd-ros-300x600-uid2",
                "width": [
                    [
                        300,
                        600
                    ]
                ],
                "bidders": false,
                "is_lazy_load": null
            },
            {
                "targeting": [],
                "slot": "3782/WWD/fashion-news/inline",
                "id": "gpt-wwd-inline-uid3",

	wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.init();
	var mobileStatsQueryString = "";
	
	if( false !== wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedPlatformName )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'mobile_platforms' + '=' + wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedPlatformName;
	
	if( false !== wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedUserAgentName )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'mobile_devices' + '=' + wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.matchedUserAgentName;
	
	if( wpcom_mobile_user_agent_info.isIPad() )
		mobileStatsQueryString += "&x_" + 'ipad_views' + '=' + 'views';

		new Image().src = document.location.protocol + '//pixel.wp.com/g.gif?v=wpcom-no-pv' + mobileStatsQueryString + '&baba=' + Math.random();

	<script src="//dc8xl0ndzn2cb.cloudfront.net/js/wwdcom/v0/keywee.min.js" type="text/javascript" async></script>
<!-- START callback function for onhashchange(when the hash tag in the url gets updated) -->
<script type="text/javascript">
function global_urlhashchanged() {

	/**
	 * Track pageview
	 */
	// Build the current domain name
	var tmp_td = document.domain.split( '.' );
	var tracking_domain = tmp_td[ tmp_td.length - 2 ] + "." + tmp_td[ tmp_td.length - 1 ];

	// Build the current image
	var imgname = location.hash.replace( '#', '' );

	// Track PV in GA
	try {
		ga( 'send', 'pageview', location.pathname + location.hash );
	} catch( err ) {}

	// Track PV in comScore
	// For content changes where the page does not reload
	// we need to send both the beacon and the fake pageview
	try {
		// Send the comScore beacon
		setTimeout(function(){ var url = "http" + (/^https:/.test(document.location.href) ? "s" : "") + "://beacon.scorecardresearch.com/scripts/beacon.dll" + "?c1=2&amp;c2=6035310&amp;c3=&amp;c4=&amp;c5=&amp;c6=&amp;c7=" + escape(document.location.href) + "&amp;c8=" + escape(document.title) + "&amp;c9=" + escape(document.referrer) + "&amp;c10=" + escape(screen.width+'x'+screen.height) + "&amp;rn=" + (new Date()).getTime(); var i = new Image(); i.src = url; }, 1);

		COMSCORE.beacon({ c1: "2", c2: "6035310", c3: "", c4: "", c5: "", c6: "", c15: "" });
	} catch( err ) {}

	// Send the comScore fake pageview
	if ('function' === typeof pmc_comscore.pageview) {
		pmc_comscore.pageview();
	}

	// PMCVIP-2580. Try PV in Keywee
	try {
		if ( typeof window.snowplowKW == 'function' ) {
			window.snowplowKW( 'trackPageView' );
		}
	} catch ( err ) {
	}
	// Track Quantcast
	try {
		_qevents.push([
			{ qacct:"p-31f3D02tYU8zY" } // PMC P-Code
		]);
	} catch( err ) {}

	/**
	 * Track pageview end
	 */
}
</script>

<!-- pmc-adm targeting -->
<script>
if ( typeof pmc !== 'undefined' && typeof pmc.hooks !== 'undefined' ) {
	pmc.hooks.add_filter( 'pmc-adm-set-targeting-keywords', function( keywords ) {
		try {
			if ( typeof Krux !== 'undefined' ) {
				if ( typeof keywords['ksg'] === 'undefined' ) {
					keywords['ksg']  = Krux.segments;
				}
				if ( typeof keywords['kuid'] === 'undefined' ) {
					keywords['kuid']  = Krux.user;
				}
			}
		} catch(e) {}
		return keywords;
	} );
}

(function() {
	if( window.hasOwnProperty('pmc_krux' ) ) {
		window.pmc_krux['destination-url'] = window.location.href;
		if( document.hasOwnProperty('referrer') && document.referrer.length ) {
			window.pmc_krux['referrer'] = document.referrer;
		}
		if( 'undefined' !== typeof pmc_meta && 'string' === pmc_meta.omni_visit_id ) {
			window.pmc_krux['omni_visit_id'] = pmc_meta.omni_visit_id;
		}
	}
})();

</script>
		<!-- DO NOT REMOVE, comment for engineering, 4BAfe4nkpyAktm3S -->
	</body>
</html>
